● Obtenir le profit total obtenu par région du monde.

hadoop jar sales.jar org.hadoop.sales.SalesDriver TotalProfit Region /data_input/sales_world_10k.csv /results_profit_region

Asia	5.874032968500012E8
Australia and Oceania	3.240712114099996E8
Central America and the Caribbean	4.033578497199999E8
Europe	1.0269996127999994E9
Middle East and North Africa	5.099238945300005E8
North America	9.94955151199999E7
Sub-Saharan Africa	9.996420915000008E8

● Obtenir le profit total obtenu par type d’item.

hadoop jar sales.jar org.hadoop.sales.SalesDriver TotalProfit ItemType /data_input/sales_world_10k.csv /results_profit_item_type

● La quantité de ventes en ligne item 

hadoop jar sales.jar org.hadoop.sales.SalesDriver UnitsSold ItemType -on /data_input/sales_world_10k.csv /results_units_sold_item_type_1
